products.name: Keraliss Technique Keratin Essential Thermic Hair Protection
products.description: Keratin thermal protector that effectively protects hair from the heat produced by the straightener and dryer. Together with the shampoo and balm from the Keraliss Technique line, it extends the duration of straightening treatments and allows you to achieve progressive straightening.
benefits: Extends the duration of straightening treatments and allows for progressive straightening
With keratin to reinforce and protect the hair fiber
Combine it with Keratin Essential Shampoo and Keratin Essential Balm

products.name: Argan Oil Hair Serum
products.description: A lightweight serum infused with argan oil to nourish and protect hair, leaving it smooth and shiny.

products.name: Coconut Milk Shampoo
products.description: A hydrating shampoo enriched with coconut milk to gently cleanse and moisturize hair, leaving it soft and manageable.

products.name: Biotin Hair Growth Conditioner
products.description: A conditioner formulated with biotin to promote hair growth and strengthen hair, reducing breakage and split ends.
